org.hibernate.search.annotations

Annotation Type FullTextFilterDef


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={PACKAGE,TYPE})
@Documented
public @interface FullTextFilterDef
    Defines a FullTextFilter that can be optionally applied to every FullText Queries While not related to a specific indexed entity, the annotation has to be set on one of them
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      Class<?> impl
      The implementation of this filter definition.
      String name 

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      FilterCacheModeType cache 

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract String name
        Returns:
        the filter name. Must be unique across all mappings for a given persistence unit

      • impl

        public abstract Class<?> impl
        The implementation of this filter definition. May be
        • a class implementing Filter or
        • a filter factory class, defining a method annotated with Factory which has no parameters and returns a Filter instance.
        The given class must define a no-args constructor and a JavaBeans setter method for each parameter to be passed via FullTextFilter.setParameter(String, Object).

        The Lucene filter created by this filter definition must be thread-safe.

        Returns:
        A class implementing Filter or a filter factory class

      • cache

        public abstract FilterCacheModeType cache
        Returns:
        The cache mode for the filter. Default to instance and results caching
        Default:
        org.hibernate.search.annotations.FilterCacheModeType.INSTANCE_AND_DOCIDSETRESULTS
